paragraphs.text: The Geffen Award (פרס גפן) is an annual literary award given by the Israeli Society for Science Fiction and Fantasy since 1999, and presented at the ICon festival, the annual Science Fiction and Fantasy Convention, It is named in honour of editor and translator Amos Geffen, who was one of the society's founders.

paragraphs.title: Categories
paragraphs.text: The Geffen awards are given out in six categories:
